fields.name: Globe of Trust
fields.description: +20% Cooldown Reduction +150% Base Mana Regen UNIQUE Active - Safe Harbor: Lobs a bubble that shields nearby allies for 150 Health and generates gold equal to 25% of the damage absorbed (maximum of 100 gold per cast) (15 second cooldown). Self cast shields will not generate gold from Monster damage. ''Theft is better with accomplices.''
